message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to potentially sell you this product. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. I know it provides a lot of value and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.

Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value it provides, but I believe I can't justify spending $15,000 on it at this time. Would you consider lowering the price to $12,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. Could you do $13,500?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still not able to meet your asking price. Can we discuss a price closer to $11,000?
